allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Phase 1 POC knowledge base with 20 curated documents

Knowledge base documents created:
- Section 1: Singapore Customs \(6 docs\) - export/import procedures, GST, CO, FTZ, HS classification
- Section 2: ASEAN Trade \(3 docs\) - tariff finder, ATIGA, rules of origin
- Section 3: Country-Specific \(5 docs\) - ID, MY, TH, VN, PH import requirements
- Section 4: Ocean Carriers \(4 docs\) - PIL, Maersk, ONE, Evergreen service summaries
- Section 5: Air Carriers \(2 docs\) - SIA Cargo, Cathay Cargo service guides

Also includes:
- POC planning documentation \(scope, use cases, architecture, roadmap\)
- CLAUDE.md project instructions
- Progress tracking checklist \(20/29 complete\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete knowledge base with reference docs and synthetic internal documents

Section 6 - Reference Documents \(3 docs\):
- Incoterms 2020 Reference: All 11 terms, GIR rules, Singapore context
- Incoterms Comparison Chart: Visual matrices, decision trees, cost examples
- HS Code Structure Guide: WCO structure, AHTN, classification examples

Section 7 - Synthetic Internal Documents \(6 docs\):
- Service Terms & Conditions: Liability, payment, claims procedures
- Sea Freight Booking Procedure: 10-step SOP with timelines
- SLA Policy: Response times, KPIs, customer tiers
- Escalation Procedure: 5-level hierarchy, P1-P4 priority matrix
- COD Handling Procedure: Collection process, risk controls
- FTA Comparison Matrix: 27 FTAs, tariff comparison, RoO guide

Knowledge base now 100% complete \(29/29 documents\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
